onboarding.title: Your doctor is online
onboarding.description: Fast and convenient communication with doctors from <bold>Europe</bold> at any time.

auth.loginSubtitle: Enter your phone number to continue. We use your Telegram account for secure authentication.
auth.privacyNotice: We do not share your phone number with third parties and use it only to sign in.
auth.registerSubtitle: Create an account with your phone number to quickly get consultations from doctors.

main.title: Doctor chat
main.description: — mobile application for online consultations with qualified doctors from Germany and Europe. Ask questions in chat and get recommendations from specialists.

europeanStandards.title: Access to European medical standards:
europeanStandards.point1: Consultations from qualified doctors from European countries without leaving your country!
europeanStandards.point2: High quality service standards and medical recommendations.

speed.title: Speed and convenience:
speed.point1: Ability to get consultation without leaving home.
speed.point2: Quick response — from a minute to an hour. Online "live queue" format.

channels.title: Variety of communication channels:
channels.point1: Ability to use text, photo, audio and video formats to communicate with the doctor.

privacy.title: Confidentiality and security:
privacy.point1: Full anonymity and protection of your data is guaranteed.

alternative.title: Safe alternative to self-diagnosis:
alternative.point1: Getting professional advice instead of harmful "self-treatment" using the internet.

feedback.title: Feedback and service improvement:
feedback.point1: Ability to leave a review and influence service improvement.

access.title: Lack of access to quality medical services:
access.point1: Difficulties finding qualified specialists in your region
access.point2: Long waiting time for doctor appointment.

doubts.title: Doubts and need for additional information:
doubts.point1: Uncertainty after previous diagnosis or treatment.
doubts.point2: Need to hear a second opinion.

fear.title: Fear and uncertainty about health:
fear.point1: Not understanding test results and desiring consultation without stress and rush.

time.title: Time and logistical constraints:
time.point1: Lack of time to visit a doctor at the office or hospital.
time.point2: When abroad, there are difficulties accessing local medical services.

visits.title: Desire to avoid unnecessary visits:
visits.point2: Preference to get consultation quickly and without formalities.

discomfort.title: Discomfort and embarrassment:
discomfort.point1: Inconvenience or shyness when discussing personal health issues face to face.
discomfort.point2: Preference for confidentiality and anonymity when interacting with a doctor

psychological.title: Psychological comfort:
psychological.point1: Stress and anxiety caused by waiting for a doctor visit or unpleasant visits to medical facilities.

warning.title: Important!
warning.text1: The legislation of the RK does not provide for prescribing prescription drugs, prescribing a course of treatment and making a diagnosis during an online consultation. For this, you need to make an appointment for an in-person visit.
warning.text2: The consultation is informational, not medical.
warning.emergency: In case of emergency, call an ambulance at 112!

errors.generalError: An error occurred while uploading the photo
